item.title: Fairy Gardens,Fairy a Garden Set with Planting Tools,Fairy House Kit for 5,6,7,8,9,10,11,12 Year Old Boys and Girls to Play and Plant,Suitable for Children as Birthday Gifts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) üå±„ÄêCreate Your Own Magic Cottage„Äë:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)



„ÄêCreate Your Own Magic Cottage„Äë:This fairy house set lets your little one grow plants using the included soil,gardening tools.Observe the whole process of plants from sowing,germination,flowering,and fruiting,experience the fun of planting,and feel the tenacity of life in nature.You can also add your favorite plants or flowers to create your own magic gardens for even more fun.
„ÄêA kids Garden Suitable for Cultivating STEM„Äë:This flower garden toy allows your child to experience the full process of plant growth: planting,growing,flowering,fruiting.In the process, children can take a closer look at their own small garden, connect with nature through the garden set, and learn about botany and the life cycle of plants.Planting a fairy gardens is a great activity that develops planting skills, responsibility and confidence.
„ÄêFairy Gardens Craft Kit„Äë:The fairy house kit includes a shovel, water can, garden toy rake, pink flower pot, mushroom house, fairy tale house,table and chairs,2 soils,and instructions for the children’s plant growth kit.With these garden tools,kids can grow their own fairy house and even decorate with some pebbles,garden toys or other fun things to play in the magical fairy world you create!
„ÄêStart Growing Your Magic Cottage Magical Cottage„Äë: Install the main body of the fairy hut following the instructions included,soak the soil in water,pour it over the upper and lower parts of the pot,place the plant in the soil with a tool.Water the plant as needed and make sure it also gets sunlight.You can play your magical gardening play set indoors or out!Watch your garden every day to see the plant sprout and grow,as well as plant your favorite flowers.
„ÄêUnique Gifts for Kids„Äë:Magic kids garden kits for girls and boys ages 3 and up are unique gifts for little ones on birthdays,Christmas, Thanksgiving and more.Children will have fun looking after their magic garden.This toy is suitable for children over 3 years old.For safety reasons,it is recommended that parents accompany children to play together.If you have any questions about toy flower garden,please feel free to contact us.We will get back to you within 24 hours.

Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:09:50 UTC – Details)

The house turns one player against the others ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $55.99 - $28.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:25:09 UTC – Details)



EXCITING THIRD EDITION: This edition of the Betrayal at the House on the Hill game is rich with horror-based content, gaming elements, and characters not seen in previous versions
HAUNTED HOUSE TRAITOR GAME: Players must work together to survive the nightmare‚Ä¶but beware . The house turns one player against the others in this cooperative strategy game
GREAT FOR NEW PLAYERS: This 3rd Edition of the game features artwork, rule books, trackers, and cards that will help new players navigate the game and jump right in
MODULAR BOARD PIECES: The Betrayal at House on the Hill tabletop game features 50 blood-curdling scenarios. Each trip to the house promises fresh horrors and a new story is created every time you play
MINIATURES BOARD GAME: The game includes 6 finely detailed character figures, each with a removable colored disc, and features 12 diverse characters not seen in previous editions

4.5
Price: $55.99 - $28.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:25:09 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:23:05 UTC – Details)



„ÄêSuper Large Projection Area„ÄëThe upgrade Christmas light projector is designed with two heads, which can cover a larger area than others, its optimal projected area of 215-323ft¬≤ with the best projection distance is 16ft-33ft, so it can well cover your house, bedroom, or garden; The clarity of patterns depends on the brightness of the environment
„ÄêWaterproof Design & Weather Resistance„ÄëThe snowflake projector light outdoor features waterproof performance, the light is IP65 waterproof rating and the power adapter is IP44 waterproof rating, which suits for outdoors no matter what weather it is raining or snowing; it can operate normally between -25¬∞C- 32¬∞C, so don’t worry about the hot summer and cold winter; please don’t let it directly soak in a rainstorm
„ÄêEasy to set up & Adjustable„Äë It just takes you a minute or two to install it; our Christmas snowflake projector light comes with a round base and a ground stake, you can put the base on a desk indoors, or you can plug the stake into the ground in your garden, yard, you also can install it on the wall with screws; Equipped with a 360¬∞shaft rotary joint, it is ever so convenient and flexible to adjust the projection place where you want, without dismantling, you can turn it anywhere you want
„ÄêXmas Gift Idea & Xmas Decoration„ÄëThe Christmas projector outdoor can be given as a special gift to your family, or friends; also it is a great choice to add to the Christmas decoration, suits for Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Valentine‚Äôs Day, family gathering, party, theme activity, garden landscape house, bedroom decorations

5

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine‚Äôs Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

‚ÄîSuper Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

‚Äî8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

‚Äî 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

‚ÄîTimer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

‚ÄîMemory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

‚ÄîSafe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

‚ÄîIP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

„ÄêWarm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control„ÄëIncluding (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. „ÄêIP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS„ÄëPerfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
„Äê4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function„ÄëOur Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
„ÄêSafety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape„ÄëUL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
„ÄêWhat You Get & Quality Assurance„Äë1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

setInitialStates(

currentMonth,

);

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:01:52 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

Super Bright Lighting

Solar motion sensor lights equipped with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K brightness, suitable as security lighting for your home.

5 Rotatable Lighting Heads

Solar wall lights has 5 swiveling lighting heads,the adjustable lamp cap can freely move up and down, left and right,which can meet various angles of irradiation.

Easy Setup

The solar led outdoor lights are easy installation, no annoying wires connect or adapters,only using the included screws to fix on any exterior & interior wall or all types of material including metal, wood or plastic.

2023 Newest Solar Lights For Outside Inside House – Super Bright LED Motion Detection Floodlights with 5 Lighting Heads

Warm Tips

1. When the solar panel is unplugged from the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2, mode 3 and mode 4 can work both at day and night.

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

1. Please turn the solar motion sensing lights power switch to the ‚ÄúON‚Äù position before first time using. then press the gear switch or use remote control to adjust the lighting mode.

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Upgraded 4 Lighting Modes: solar motion activated light has 4 lighting modes: Mode 1: the light turn on for 20s when detected movement at night. Mode 2: light turns on in dim mode at night, get brighter for 20s when detected movement. Mode 3: the light will always turn on and stay medium light at night with or without detecting motion. Mode 4: light turns on for 20 seconds when detects movements both in daytime and night.
Innovative 5 Lighting Heads Design: our solar wall lamps is equipped with 5 rotating lighting heads and pivoting solar panels,it can move up and down, left and right, easily adjust the lamp cap,solar panel and motion sensor to any angles as your requirement,up to 360¬∞ wide lighting angle,bring you a fantastic lighting experience.
Ultra Bright with 300LED Solar Power Lights: with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K high brightness output,which can fully achieve the brightness required by daily life. equipped with upgraded PIR motion sensor, solar spot lights can detect up to 120 degree with a longer sensor length of 28feet,motion detection solar lights can sense people,animal,cars etc.
All Weather Resistant: solar garden lights is made of durable high-strength ABS material,reaching IP65 waterproof level,which can withstand many kinds of extreme weather, such as snow, frost,rain and high temperature etc,great led exterior flood lights for fence, balcony, pathway, patio,porch,deck,street,stairs,steps,yard etc

From the brand

Light Up Your Life

Hot Sale Icicle Lights

Popular String Lights

Classic Christmas Mini Lights

CLuster Lights Christmas Tree

Christmas Icicle Lights

„Äê Energy Saving & Safe to Use„ÄëThese UL588-listed icicle outdoor lights come with a 29V low voltage plug, offer up to 90% in energy savings than traditional incandescent lights and ensure the max safety. This means children, and pets are safe to touch the hanging Christmas lights. More safety and less power consumption.
„Äê8 Modes with Remote & Memory „ÄëOur LED icicle string lights offer 8 different lighting modes for you to choose from (Steady on, In Wave, Sequential, Slo-Glo, Chasing Flash, Fade, Twinkling Flash, and Combination). And thanks to the built-in memory chip, our fairy icicle lights will save your last time lights setting.
„Äê4 Brightness levels & 3 Timer Function„Äë4 Brightness level: 100%-75%-50%-25%; 3 Timer Function: 6H on, 18H off/ 8H on, 16H off/ 6H on, 6H off, 3H on, 9H off. You can adjust Christmas lights for the house by remote easily, and choose one favorite mode to enhance the Christmas spirit.
„ÄêIP44 Waterproof „ÄëThe Waterproof Christmas string lights are designed to withstand light rain or water spills, making them perfect for both indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations even on rainy or snowy days, like eave, patio, stair, gazebo, fence, trees, roof awnings, or even hung on the wall of your bedroom.

Ollny Christmas Icicle Lights Decorate Your Life!

You can adjust modes/dimmable/times by remote easily. Choose one favorite mode to create your lively Christmas atmosphere. Connected led Christmas lights can be controlled by one remote. For 720LED 60FT long Icicle Lights, we recommend connecting only 2 sets to ensure the lighting effect.

Package included

1x 720LED Multicolor Icicle Lights

1x Remote

1x UL Plug

1x Controller

1x Manual

Specification

LED Qty: 720LED, total 120 drops

Light Length: 60ft

Lead Cable: 16.4ft

Wire Color: Clear White

Material: Copper+Plastic

Connectable: Max of 3 Set

Rated Voltage: 29V Safe Plug In

Read more

IP44 Waterproof

Effectively block rainwater from entering. Make Christmas string lights not only be used indoors but also outdoor usage even on rainy, snowy, or storm days.

Safe to Touch

Stay cool, you can use and touch them outdoors or indoors safely. Come with a 29V low voltage power plug. More safe and Less power consumption.

Memory Function

A built-in memory chip will save your last mode settings. There is no need to reset the mode each day.

Read more

Installation

These icicle lights were neatly packed, which makes it easy to unpack them without creating a tangle. Please kindly hang the main string of lights first, then unwrap the individual strings to avoid tangling.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $49.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:31:12 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Home is the warmest place in the world, without a doubt. And home is the best place to share happiness and joy, with family and friends alike. Decorative lights, in this way, can not only embellish the feeling of home, but also bring spirituality, style, energy, glitz, glamour, and gusto! When the inspiration for decorative lighting jumped into Sylvia Lin‚Äôs mind in 2016, she decided to make this dream come true and so the brand Ollny was born!

180LED/60FT Series

240LED/80FT Green Wire Series

240LED/80FT Clear Wire Series

300LED/100FT Series

50LED/25FT Big Bulbs Series

„ÄêMultifunctional Remote Control Solar Fairy Lights„Äë‚ë† Remote Control: Use the remote to switch the solar fairy lights colors and light modes conveniently( Adjusted on solar panel available too). ‚ë° Timer Function: 3 timer function (4/6/8H) to schedule solar string lights work times automatically. ‚ë¢ Memory Function: Restart solar Christmas lights will keep the last time lighting modes.
„ÄêIP67 Waterproof Outdoor Solar Lights„ÄëThe solar string lights is IP67 Waterproof Rated and the solar panel is IP65 Waterproof Rated. They are connected by a waterproof connector. Each LED bulb is incorporated with watertight seals, and the string lights wire are made of copper and PVC which is strong and durable. Feel free to use Onlly solar tree lights on rainy/storm/snowy days.
„ÄêHighly Efficient Solar Powered String Lights„ÄëThe large-capacity solar panel only takes 6 hours to full charge under sufficient sunlight, and the lighting work time can reach 18 hours. With higher light control settings, it can work normally when it illuminated by car/ street/ lawn lights. The solar panel can automatically charge whether the power button is turn on or off, which is more efficient and energy-saving.
„ÄêOutdoor Indoor Decorative Lights„ÄëSolar fairy lights automatically ON at night and OFF at dawn. Just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place.Supports ground and wall installation to meet your more needs. Perfect for outdoor/indoor/Christmas decorations, wedding, birthday, party, trees, porch, door, garden, patio, backyard, balcony.

Longer, Brighter, Smoother and More Colorful Solar String Light
  • Length of String Lights : Each 80FT/24m
  • LED Quantity: Each 240 LEDs
  • Mode: 11 Lighting Modes
  • Solar Panel Size: 115*95 mm
  • Material: Copper+PVC
  • Waterproof Rated: IP67
  • Remote Control Distance: 10 meters

Why Choose Ollny Solar String Lights?

  • 2 Pack each 80FT 240LED super long solar string lights meet your more needs.
  • Copper wire wrapped in PVC for adding protection and reducing tangling or knotting.
  • 11 modes: 4 steadies on modes (warm white and 3 different mixture color) and 7 flashing modes.
  • Remote Control+Timer Function (4H. 6H. 8H)+Memory Function (keep the last time lighting modes).
  • IP67 wterproof rated ,available on rainy/storm/snowy days.
  • Large capacity solar panel, charging time about 6 hours (under sufficient sunlight) and working time about 18 hours.
  • Higher light control settings,work normally when it illuminated by car lights / street lights / lawn lights at night.
  • Solar panels can automatically charge both the power button is turned ON and OFF.

Read more

Read more

Do you want to make your house dance at night or decorate the big tree in front of your door? Do you want a romantic wedding or have a lively party? Ollny Solar Fairy Lights comes in warm white and 3 mixture colors, 11 modes can meet your more needs.

Higher Light Control Settings

Ollny solar string light is designed with high-level light control, so this solar fairy lights can work well when illuminated by other lights.( Tip: For better nighttime lighting, please pay attention to the distance between the solar panel and other illuminating light sources.)

Super Bright LED

Ollny 2 pack solar string lights each has 80FT, 240LED, super long and bright. The copper wire is wrapped by protective PVC, which will not be tangled or knotted. And each bright LED maintains a constant brightness until it runs out of power.

IP67 Waterproof

Solar string lights is IP67 Waterproof and the solar panel is IP65 Waterproof. They are connected by a waterproof connector. Each LED is incorporated with watertight seals, just feel free to use Onlly solar tree lights on rainy, storm, snowy days.

Read more

Adjustable Solar Panel

Ollny solar panels and solar fairy lights are detachable for easy installation and replacement. The solar panel was designed to rotate 180¬∞, which can make it absorbing more solar energy and getting longer working effects.

2 Installation Method

Supports ground and wall installation, just connect the string lights to the solar panel and put the solar panel in a sunny place. And Ollny solar string lights comes with 2m connection cable, easy to meet your indoor and outdoor decoration needs.

Big Size Solar Panel

4.53*3.74 inch big solar panel size absorb solar energy faster. And the solar panel can automatically charge whether the power button is turn on or off, which is more efficient and energy-saving. The back of the solar panel can shows the light working state clearly.

Read more





Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights
Solar String Lights

Warranty & Support

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:15 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Christmas Projector Lights

Control the movement speed of the projector light to make the lights dance, create a romantic Christmas atmosphere.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Red and Green Projector Light

Wall-mounted

„ÄêWide Coverage„ÄëWith a larger projection area and clearer picture quality, this newest upgraded Christmas light projector can cover up to 3800sf from a distance of 33ft. Anytime, anywhere, create a a cool afffect for you. The power cord of our outdoor star show light is extended to 9.84 ft, which can reach many places. Don’t worry about running out of power outdoors. Perfect for Christmas, birthday parties, festival, party, landscape and wedding decoration
„ÄêRemote Control & Timer„Äë50ft barrier free control, easily control the movement speed of the light, change the color of the light. What’s more, this christmas lights outdoor projector has a timer function (0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h). No need to worry about power consumption, these noiseless rotating light visuals will accompany you into a warm dream
„ÄêEasy Installation„ÄëComes with a long ground stake and round base, to insert the projection lamp into the ground or just place on the ground/table/home. Besides, it can also be mounted on th wall. Easy to move to get any areas, it only takes 1 second to create a romantic atmosphere full of stunning illumination!
„ÄêWeather Resistance„ÄëThe outdoor projector light with IP65 waterproof rating, high strength, high toughness. So you do not need to worry about snow, rain, dust and strong sunlight. Rotate the projector head, to fill any place you want with romantic star light (Note: the power plug is IP44 waterproof, do not expose it water or moisture!)

Read more

Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor with Remote Control & Timer, Weather Resistance, Wide Coverage, 6 Patterns

Adjustable projection distance & Super large projection area

  • The best projection distance of this christmas projector light is 16ft-33ft.
  • The upgraded Christmas projector light has a larger projection area and clearer picture quality. Collocated with 360¬∞ adjustable projector head, construct a dreamy fairy tale world for you.

Star Shower Christmas Projector Lights Outdoor

With red and green lights blinking on the house, wall, ceiling, and lawn, our Christmas projection lights create a romantic holiday atmosphere

Package Includes

1 x Christmas Projector light

1 x Ground stake

1 x Remote

1 x AC adapter with 3m cable

1 x User instruction

Specification

  • Operating voltages:120V
  • DC adapter:5V 3W
  • Operating temperature: -25‚ÑÉ to 35‚ÑÉ
  • Material: plastic
  • Waterproof Rank of Light: IP65
  • Waterproof Rank of Plug: IP44
  • Effective removal of the remote control: <15m
  • Scope of application: indoor & outdoor

Read more

Christmas Lights Outdoor Projector

No need for long ladders, complicated installations, troublesome dismantling decorations, or climbing on the house. Say goodbye to traditional hanging string lights. Just turn on our Christmas projector Lights and get a beautiful meteor shower in no time. Great for holiday and commercial ambient decorations, also a fantastic Christmas gift for lover, family, friends, or colleagues.

Flexible Installation

  • Placed on plane; Ground-mounted; Wall-mounted

Read more

Weather Resistance

With IP65 waterproof rating, our christmas lights outdoor projector has high strength, high toughness. Don’t worry about rain, snow, dust, and intense sunlight, enjoy the wonderful and fairy Christmas world.

Wonderful Landscape Spotlight

6 patterns (snowflake, Jingle bell, Christmas tree, Santa Claus, Fireworks and starry sky); 3 working modes (green, red, green and red mixed). Create vivid and beautiful light with the different projector angle.

Outdoor & Indoor Use

Equipped with a round base and ground stake, the star show projector light can be placed anywhere(indoor placement, ground-mounted, wall-mounted). 9.84ft extended power cord solves outdoor wiring issue.

Read more

Remote Control

  • 50ft barrier free control, no point to point operation, easily control the movement speed of the starry projector lamp, change the color of the light.
  • Timer Function: 0.5h, 3h, 5h and 8h on. No need to worry about power consumption, switch the light off at regular intervals.
  • Power cord is 9.84ft. No worry about not being able to touch the power source outdoors.

4.5
